thread.title: The work of Nobel prize-winning economist Angus Deaton
thread.title_full: The work of Nobel prize-winning economist Angus Deaton

author: From bbc.com
title: The work of Nobel prize-winning economist Angus Deaton
text: From bbc.com Prof Deaton, 69, is currently professor of economics and international affairs at the Woodrow Wilson School of Public and International Affairs at Princeton University, in New Jersey. What did he do to win the prize? The Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences, which awards the prize, said that Prof Deaton's work has transformed several fields of economics. More specifically, the organisation said he had made an impact on economic theory, and on the practical application of data to investigate poverty, and devise economic policy. The headline to the statement from the academy that announced that Prof Deaton was its 2015 winner said: ... (
